title: Akron cop sues police chief, claims retaliation over use-of-force article
text:
Akron cop sues police chief, claims retaliation over use-of-force article 
Published By: Cleveland.com - Today 
A longtime Akron police officer is suing the city and its police chief, claiming that he was retaliated against for an article about use of ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
